officeOfManagerAdministration.role: Responsible for providing excellent facilities to students, faculty, officers, and staff; managing security, transport, maintenance, procurement, and infrastructure development.
responsibilities: Event and function support (Convocations, Olympiads, conferences, etc.)

buildingAndWorks.description: Monitors procurement of stores, equipment, furniture, fixtures; oversees new construction and renovation; ensures safety and security of buildings, students, and employees.

transport.description: Operates buses, vans, and pickups for daily student transport from Taxila and surroundings at nominal charges; two main routes plus local transport options; new vehicle acquisition in progress.

security.description: Provides round‑the‑clock indigenous security services via vigilant guards, fenced boundary walls, and CCTV cameras to ensure a safe environment for all campus users.

miscellaneousServices.description: Provides learning materials, internet, photocopier, stationery items, and secretarial facilities.
Serves hygienic food at economical rates.
Manages campus beautification, an on‑campus nursery for evergreen and seasonal plants, and a water feeding system for fountains and green belts.
A trained team maintains cleanliness of buildings, offices, auditoria, grounds, and open areas through sweeping, mopping, vacuuming, dusting, and spot cleaning.
